Package model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing an Item. Has default price, current price, expiration date, product and quantity.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
